title: Black Public Relations Society of Los Angeles MEMBERSHIP
desc: Join BPRS-LA ? Join BPRS-LA today, and?become a member of one of the most prominent professional organizations in the nation. ?? Annual dues: $75 for professionals? $30 for students BPRS-LA focuses on increasing opportunities for career growth and development for ?African American professionals while fostering diversity throughout the communications industry. Whether you are a working PR practitioner, considering a career move into the profession, or a student interested in the field, BPRS-LA has something for you.?  As a member of BPRS-LA, you?will have access to leading communications professionals in public relations, public affairs, marketing communications, media relations, community affairs, government affairs, and more. BPRS-LA offers professional development, networking, mentoring, career and internship opportunities. This year, we having an exciting slate of?quality programs and events, that you wouldn't want to miss. Thank you for investing in BPRS-LA and we look forward to investing in you!
